statements: SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role LIKE '%user%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin' ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE user_id BETWEEN 1 AND 100 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE password LIKE '%abc%' ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'user' AND username IN ('john', 'jane', 'alice') ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_name FROM roles;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe' AND password = 'abc123';
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users JOIN roles ON users.user_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'a%';
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT id, name FROM users
SELECT * FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC
SELECT id, role_name FROM roles WHERE id > 2
SELECT id, table_name, permission_type FROM permissions
SELECT * FROM users WHERE name='John' AND role='Admin';
SELECT id, name FROM users WHERE role='User' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT r.role_name, p.permission_type FROM roles r INNER JOIN permissions p ON r.id = p.role_id WHERE p.permission_type='read';
SELECT u.name, r.role_name, p.table_name FROM users u LEFT JOIN roles r ON u.role = r.role_name LEFT JOIN permissions p ON r.id = p.role_id;
SELECT u.id AS user_id, u.name AS user_name, r.role_name AS user_role FROM users u JOIN roles r ON u.role = r.role_name WHERE u.role='Admin' ORDER BY u.id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT username, password FROM Users WHERE user_id = '1234';
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM UserRoles;
SELECT role_name FROM Roles WHERE role_id = '5678';
SELECT * FROM Permissions WHERE permission_name = 'read';
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM Users AS u JOIN UserRoles AS ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN Roles AS r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(ur.role_id) AS role_count FROM Users AS u JOIN UserRoles AS ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id GROUP BY u.username;
SELECT p.permission_name, r.role_name FROM Permissions AS p JOIN Roles AS r ON p.permission_id = r.role_id
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE permission_id IN (3, 4);
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id > 2 ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users INNER JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id INNER JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;

SELECT username, role_name, permission_name FROM users INNER JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id INNER JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id INNER JOIN role_permissions ON user_roles.role_id = role_permissions.role_id INNER JOIN permissions ON role_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT username, COUNT(role_id) AS total_roles FROM users INNER JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id GROUP BY username HAVING total_roles > 1;
